#### Event
```{r results_missing_patterns_eq5d_event, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = 'show', cache = FALSE, fig_width = 10, fig_height = 20, eval = TRUE}
t <- age_gap %>%
     dplyr::select(individual_id, event_name, site, mobility, self_care, usual_activity, pain_discomfort, anxiety_depression, health_today, eq5d_number, eq5d_score) %>%
     gather(key = identifier, value = value, -individual_id, -event_name, -site) %>%
     ungroup() %>%
     mutate(Missing = is.na(value),
            individual_id = factor(individual_id)) %>%
     dplyr::filter(event_name != 'Surgery')
t <- left_join(t,
               master$lookups_fields) %>%
     ggplot(., aes(x = label, y = individual_id, fill = Missing)) +
     geom_raster() +
     facet_grid(event_name~., scales = 'free_y') +
     theme_bw() +
     theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
t
## Plot using ggplotly
## ggplotly(t)


```
